text: Why Girls Leave Home is a 1945 American drama movie directed by William Berke and starring Lola Lane, Sheldon Leonard, Pamela Blake, Elisha Cook Jr., Paul Guilfoyle, Constance Worth, Claudia Drake, Virginia Brissac, Fred Kohler. It was nominated for 2 Academy Awards in 1946. ==Other websites== * Category:1945 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies directed by William Berke
title: Why Girls Leave Home
